column4: i've created my first linux theme, and would like to share with anyone who is willing to look at it
why not upload it to gnome-look.org ? that's what it's there for
if it's a gnome theme, of course
i dunno if it's good enough http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=9208642#post9208642
of course it is =) give it a try
i just compressed it, and installed it, but i get an error when i install it. can you download it, and install it, and let me know what i can do about it?
I'll have a look.. do you have the url?
i didnt upload it to gnome looks yet. i want to fix this before i do http://dl.free.fr/pMydOAfBs
were you able to download it from that link i sent?
yup.. I'm testing it now.. looks nice.. white and clean
thanks. it's what i think ubuntu should look like
hmm.. something about window manager theme sliclean not installed?
I don't get a preview picture either.. not really sure why it does that.. might be related to the error
one sec, i'm trying to fix it
